cause.description:
Sdeyrot is a small town in western Israel. Under constant attack,men, women, and children of Sdeyrot find themselves more accustomed to bomb shelters than anything else. In May of 2007, a semi evacuation of Sdeyrot residents took place because of a rapid increase of Qassam rockets from Hamas and other Islamic fundamentalists.
1. Sdeyrot should no longer live in fear.
cause.mission: spread awareness of the harsh conditions in the city of Sdeyrot, Israel
cause.name: Solidarity in Sdeyrot
